rows.translation: OF WHAT ARE they asking one another?

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.

rows.translation: (Is it) of the great announcement
About which they have been differing?
Indeed they will come to know soon;
They will indeed come to know soon.
Did We not make the earth a spreading,
The mountains tent-pins?
We created you in pairs,
And made sleep for you to rest,
The night a covering,
And the day for seeking livelihood.
We raised over you several secure (skies),
And placed a lamp therein brightly burning.
And We sent down rain from water-laden clouds pouring in torrents
That We may produce from it grain and vegetation,
And orchards full of trees and interlacing boughs.
Surely a time is fixed for the Day of Judgement.

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
rows.translation: The day the trumpet blast is sounded you will come in hordes;
rows.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fiṣ ṣūri fata-tūna afwājā

rows.translation: The heavens will be opened wide and turn into so many doors,
The mountains put in motion turning into a mirage.
Certainly Hell lies in wait,
The rebels' abode,
Where they will remain for aeons,

rows.arabic: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
rows.translation: Finding neither sleep nor any thing to drink
rows.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā bardan walā sharābā

rows.translation: Except boiling water and benumbing cold:
, A fitting reward.
They were those who did not expect a reckoning,
And rejected Our signs as lies.
We have kept account of everything in a book.
So taste (the fruit of what you sowed), for We shall add nothing but torment,
As for those who preserve themselves from evil and follow the straight path, there is attainment for them:
Orchards and vineyards,
And graceful maidens of the same age,
And flasks full and flowing.

rows.arabic: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّٰبًا
rows.translation: They will hear no blasphemies there or disavowals:
rows.transliteration: lā yasma`ūna fīhā laghwan walā kidhhābā

rows.translation: A recompense from your Lord, a sufficient gift,

rows.arabic: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
rows.translation: The Lord of the heavens and the earth, and all that lies between them, most benevolent, to whom none may dare address a word.
rows.transliteration: rabbis samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā baynahumar raḥmān ۖ lā yamlikūna minhu khiṭābā

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
rows.translation: The day the Spirit takes its stand, with the angels ranged in rows. None will speak except who is permitted by Ar-Rahman and says what is right.
rows.transliteration: yawma yaqūmur rūḥu wal malā-ikatu ṣaffā ۖ lā yatakallamūna illā man adhina lahur raḥmānu waqāla ṣawābā

rows.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
rows.translation: That day is certain. So whosoever likes may prepare a way to his Lord.
rows.transliteration: dhālikal yawmul ḥaqq ۖ faman shā-at-takhadha ilā rabbihi ma-ābā

rows.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنذَرْنَـٰكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلْكَافِرُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى كُنتُ تُرَٰبًۢا
rows.translation: We have indeed warned you of a calamity near at hand, a day when man will see what he had sent (of his deeds) ahead, and the unbeliever will say: "Woe alas. Ah would that I were dust!"
rows.transliteration: innā andharnākum `adhāban qarīban yawma yanẓurul mar-u mā qaddamat yadāhu wayaqūlul kāfiru yālaytanī kuntu turābā
